DOC.brief_summary: The purpose of this study is to investigate the appropriate window setting of chest computed tomography to select a correct size of double-lumen endobronchial tube.
DOC.brief_title: CT Window Setting to Select Double-lumen Tube Size
DOC.criteria: Patients undergoing thoracic surgery that require the placement of leftsided doublelumen tubes Abnoraml anatomy of tracheobronchail tree Intraluminal lesion in the left mainstem bronchus Anticipated difficult intubation
